message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still cannot go beyond $12,000 for the product. Thank you for understanding.
